actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend part A of title IV of the Social Security Act to establish a minimum AFDC benefit amount to be required of all States, and to provide additional Federal matching for States which are presently below such minimum amount to assist them in increasing their AFDC payments to comply with such requirement.

summary.text: Amends titles IV (Aid to Families with Dependent Children) and part A (General Provisions) of title XI of the Social Security Act to: (1) establish a minimum monthly benefit amount under title IV; and (2) increase Federal funds for States in order to assist them in providing such benefit.

titles.title: A bill to amend part A of title IV of the Social Security Act to establish a minimum AFDC benefit amount to be required of all States, and to provide additional Federal matching for States which are presently below such minimum amount to assist them in increasing their AFDC payments to comply with such requirement.
